subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter set a franchise record with 40 points, but the Liberty fell into last place in the W.N.B.A.’s Eastern Conference with an 84-81 overtime loss to the Indiana Fever on Sunday at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter set a franchise record with 40 points, but the Liberty fell into last place in the W.N.B.A.’s Eastern Conference with an 84-81 overtime loss to the Indiana Fever on Sunday at Madison Square Garden.
